name: DeskBreak
0:
”Alexa launch Desk Break”
”Alexa open Desk Break”
”Alexa start Desk Break”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: desk break
Developer Terms of Use
des:
DeskBreak not only helps you to set reminders to get up and take a break from sitting all day long, but it gives you optional stretches and movements to incorporate into your workday.
Sitting for extended periods of time has shown to be extremely detrimental to our health and
wellbeing. With desk jobs and working from home becoming a more permanent solution to the
pandemic, it is more important than ever for us to be mindful of how much time we spend in a seated
position.
Sitting all day long can lead to health problems such as lower back pain, neck pain, and hip and pelvic floor issues. It also has been shown to be a contributing factor to mortality.
Developed and designed by Dr. Shannon Connolly to combat the lower back pain and pelvic floor issues she sees every day in her practice.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
